item.title: Leveraging LLMs for Threat modeling - GPT-3.5
item.description: In this article, I delve into the AI Nutrition-Pro experiment, a research project exploring the potential of LLMs in enhancing security practices during the design phase of DevSecOps: threat modeling and security review. DevSecOps: A Brief Overview DevSecOps merges the principles of development, security, and operations to create a culture of shared responsibility for software security. The three main goals of DevSecOps are: Shift Left Security: Identifying and addressing security vulnerabilities as early as possible in the software development lifecycle.
